sentences.en: Do you wish to waive right to examine this letter of recommendation?
sentences.cn: 选择看与不看推荐信,有区别 吗 ?

sentences.en: He waive his claim to the estate.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了对遗产的要求权.

sentences.en: I waive ACS of all liability in a case of an emergency.
sentences.cn: 全,如果发生意外事故与组织者无关.

sentences.en: I'll record to our habitat office waive claim immediately.
sentences.cn: 我立即写信给咱们的总自己搞提出放弃索赔.

sentences.en: I'll record to our habitat office waive our claim immediately.
sentences.cn: 我立即写信给咱们的总公司提出放弃索赔.

sentences.en: I'll write to our home office to waive our claim immediately.
sentences.cn: 我立即写信给我们的总公司提出放弃索赔.

sentences.en: I'll write to our home office waive our claim immediately.
sentences.cn: 我立即写信给我们地总公司提出放弃索赔.

sentences.en: In view of the unusual circumstances, they agree to waive their requirement.
sentences.cn: 鉴于特殊情况, 他们同意放弃他们的要求.

sentences.en: It'seems we'll have waive the claim.
sentences.cn: 看来,我们只好放弃索赔了.

sentences.en: Jane : There usually is, but I can waive it.
sentences.cn: 阿珍?通常要, 不过我可以不收.

sentences.en: She waived her right to a lawyer.
sentences.cn: 她放弃了请律师的权利。

sentences.en: SHOULD THE APPLICANT WAIVE THE DISCREPANCY ( IES ) WE SHALL RELEASE DOCUMENTS.
sentences.cn: 如果开 证 人接受不符点,我们将放单给开证人.

sentences.en: The Graduate School cannot waive or defer the application fee.
sentences.cn: 报名费不能退还,不能推迟,也不能豁免.

sentences.en: To withdraw waive ; abandon a claim.
Waive the business registration fee for one year.
We cannot waive this rule except in case of illness.
sentences.cn: 我们不能放弃这项规定,除非因病例外.

trans.tran_en: to state officially that a right, rule etc can be ignored
